operations.notes:
Allows administrators to define labels for different regions and languages. Using this API you can define a label to be used in your UI. You should NOT store sensetive information as labels.

This operation requires the scopes: 'smartcanvas.admin.write'.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: Client ID required to make this API call

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Access token

parameters.name: x-suppress-response-codes
parameters.description: If 'true', the HTTP response is always 200. Default = 'false'

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Label name that will be used as a key to store its value. Should not contain spaces or special characters.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Label value

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for this label in format [language]-[country]. That's an optional value. If null, this label will be valid for all locales.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category for this label. That's an useful way to group labels altogether.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description for this label.

responseMessages.message: See Response Codes for all response and error codes

operations.notes:
Allows administrators to create locales. Each locale has a region (example: us - United States or br - Brazil) and a language (example: en - English or pt - Portuguese). There is one default locale per tenant.

This operation requires the scopes: 'smartcanvas.admin.write'.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: Client ID required to make this API call

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Access token

parameters.name: x-suppress-response-codes
parameters.description: If 'true', the HTTP response is always 200. Default = 'false'

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale to be created in format [language]-[country].

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Label to be used for that locale. This fields supports i18n.

parameters.name: iconUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the icon that represents this locale

parameters.name: isDefault
parameters.description: Indicates if this locale is default or not. If there is another locale defined as default, this locale assume this position.

responseMessages.message: See Response Codes for all response and error codes

operations.notes: Returns a list of locales defined for this tenant
